abstract: In Cobble Hill, Brooklyn, neighbors have come to appreciate the dedication of Jane Greengold, who on Monday decorated a fence around her house with 110 little pumpkins stuck onto 110 spikes.
snippet: In Cobble Hill, Brooklyn, neighbors have come to appreciate the dedication of Jane Greengold, who on Monday decorated a fence around her house with 110 little pumpkins stuck onto 110 spikes.
lead_paragraph: There is a three-story house of fading red brick in Cobble Hill, Brooklyn, that gets a bit spooky looking at Halloween, with a rusty fence of iron spikes that only adds to the ominous look.

headline.main: Jane the Impaler and a Ghastly Halloween Tradition
